lyric:
[by:Dean_Damn]
[00:08.97]Up, up, up, doom and gloom clouds gathering
[00:13.57]Up, up, over my head
[00:16.52]
[00:18.22]Up, up, up, doom and gloom clouds gathering
[00:22.71]Flash flood under my bed
[00:25.77]
[00:27.42]Love, no such thing as love, oh, love letters fade(Up, up, up, doom and gloom clouds gathering)
[00:32.93]Away in the rain(Up, up, over my head)
[00:35.44]
[00:36.41]Love, no such thing as love, oh, lovers parade(Up, up, up, doom and gloom clouds gathering)
[00:41.75]Around til the rain(Flash flood under my bed)
[00:44.06]Pulled the curtains though the sun had given up
[00:48.84]My blackened heart was next in line
[00:53.31]Waste my day away just staring at the ceiling
[00:57.85]My memories keep leaking in
[01:02.09]
[01:02.31]Can't stand the rain
[01:06.87]Can't stand the rain
[01:11.46]Can't stand the rain (No such thing as love)
[01:15.93]Can't stand the rain (Flash flood under my bed)
[01:20.22]
[01:20.59]Can't stand the rain
[01:23.68]Falling slowly
[01:27.32]Drip, drop, drive me insane
[01:29.63]Can't stand the rain
[01:32.72]No one knows me
[01:35.73]Like my baby do
[01:38.81]
[01:38.99]My skies of blue
[01:41.38]Gone down the drain
[01:44.26]With the rain
[01:46.06]
[01:56.05]I've got pots and pans all scattered 'round the bedroom
[02:00.62]I'd empty them out but why?
[02:05.04]No one left for me to straighten up the place for
[02:09.68]Nothing left to do but cry
[02:14.17]Can't stand the rain (No such thing as love)
[02:18.76]Can't stand the rain (Flash flood under my bed)
[02:23.41]Can't stand the rain (No such thing as love)
[02:27.96]Can't stand the rain (Flash flood under my bed)
[02:32.38]Can't stand the rain
[02:35.81]Falling slowly
[02:38.72]Drip, drop, drive me insane
[02:41.52]Can't stand the rain
[02:44.55]No one knows me
[02:47.65]Like my baby do
[02:50.98]My skies of blue
[02:53.28]Gone down the drain
[02:56.16]With the rain
[03:08.07]Can't stand the rain (No such thing as love)
[03:15.74]Can't stand the rain (Flash flood under my bed)
[03:17.14]Can't stand the rain (No such thing as love)
[03:21.72]Can't stand the rain (Flash flood under my bed)
[03:26.66]
[03:27.93]Love, no such thing as love, oh, love letters(Up, up, up, doom and gloom clouds gathering)
[03:32.59]Fade away in the rain(Flash flood under my bed)
[03:35.35]Can't stand the rain
[03:40.13]Can't stand the rain
[03:44.96]
[03:48.30]
tlyric:
[by:Le_lapin]
[00:08.97]向上，向上，向上，阴郁末日，阴云密布
[00:13.57]向上，向上，升至我的头顶
[00:18.22]向上，向上，向上，阴郁末日，阴云密布
[00:22.71]床下洪流涌入
[00:27.42]爱，已无所谓的爱，情书（向上，向上，向上，阴郁末日，阴云密布）
[00:32.93]消逝在雨中（向上，向上，升至我的头顶）
[00:36.41]爱，已无所谓的爱，恋人（向上，向上，向上，阴郁末日，阴云密布）
[00:41.75]分离在雨中（床下洪流涌入）
[00:44.06]早已黯然的日光令我拉上了窗帘
[00:48.84]灰暗的心情随之而来
[00:53.31]荒度整日凝视着天花板
[00:57.85]回忆如雨水般渗入
[01:02.31]不堪忍受这雨季
[01:06.87]不堪忍受这雨季
[01:11.46]不堪忍受这雨季（已无所谓的爱）
[01:15.93]不堪忍受这雨季（床下洪流涌入）
[01:20.59]不堪忍受这雨季
[01:23.68]雨水徐徐滴落
[01:27.32]滴滴答答令我发狂
[01:29.63]不堪忍受这雨季
[01:32.72]无人懂我
[01:35.73]如我爱人那般懂我
[01:38.99]我那忧郁天空
[01:41.38]流入下水道
[01:44.26]随着雨水一起
[01:56.05]锅碗瓢盆凌乱散落在卧室各处
[02:00.62]清空它们却不知为何
[02:05.04]无人值得我整理房间
[02:09.68]无事能做我唯有哭泣
[02:14.17]不堪忍受这雨季（已无所谓的爱）
[02:18.76]不堪忍受这雨季（床下洪流涌入）
[02:23.41]不堪忍受这雨季（已无所谓的爱）
[02:27.96]不堪忍受这雨季（床下洪流涌入）
[02:32.38]不堪忍受这雨季
[02:35.81]雨水徐徐滴落
[02:38.72]滴滴答答令我发狂
[02:41.52]不堪忍受这雨季
[02:44.55]无人懂我
[02:47.65]如我爱人那般懂我
[02:50.98]我那忧郁天空
[02:53.28]流入下水道
[02:56.16]随着雨水一起
[03:08.07]不堪忍受这雨季（已无所谓的爱）
[03:15.74]不堪忍受这雨季（床下洪流涌入）
[03:17.14]不堪忍受这雨季（已无所谓的爱）
[03:21.72]不堪忍受这雨季（床下洪流涌入）
[03:27.93]爱，已无所谓的爱，情书（向上，向上，向上，阴郁末日，阴云密布）
[03:32.59]消逝在雨中（床下洪流涌入）
[03:35.35]不堪忍受这雨季
